title: Fox News’ Jesse Watters Confronts Man Who Harassed Ivanka Trump On Flight
text:
He then shouted, “Why is she on our flight? She should be flying private.” 
Trump was with her children, ages 5, 3 and less than a year. 
JetBlue released a statement following the incident, saying, “The decision to remove a customer from a flight is not taken lightly. If the crew determines that a customer is causing conflict on the aircraft, the customer will be asked to deplane, especially if the crew feels the situation runs the risk of escalation during flight. Our team worked to re-accommodate the party on the next available flight.” 
A petition has been started to have Lasner removed from his professorship at Hunter College in New York. 
It reads, in part: 
Matt Lasner’s conduct is a direct representation of Hunter College. We believe his immature and cruel harassment of Ivanka Trump and her family at JFK airport should be met with disciplinary action. …
